title: radare2 wrong output
content:
I saw rasm2 giving different output each time for x64 Take a look at this: 

C:\WINDOWS\system32>rasm2 -a x86 -b 64 -d "41f6c7FF"
test r15b, 0xff

C:\WINDOWS\system32>rasm2 -a x86 -b 64 "test r15b, 0xff"
f7ffff000000

C:\WINDOWS\system32>rasm2 -v
rasm2 3.5.1 1 @ windows-x86-64 git.3.5.1
commit: 4ec482ba2d4f554beeafb3aa47758e970bcab937 build: Wed 05/15/2019__ 7:58:44.85

Is this some unresolved bug or did I do something wrong?

comments.text: it's probably is a bug. I would ask for this in the r2's telegram group or file na issue on GitHub.

Yes, this is more likely a bug, feel free to submit it to radare2's issue tracker . In fact, GitHub is using also Markdown, so just copy/paste your question to the issue tracker, this should be enough.
